Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelClient

Class DashBoardClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.Dashboard
it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelClient.DashBoardClient
public class DashBoardClient
extends Dashboard
The type Dash board client. Instead of storing all the Development card, store just the top one, the ones you can see in a normal game

  • Method Details

    • isSomethingBuyable

      public boolean isSomethingBuyable​(GameClient game)
      These methods is used from client side for checking if a player has enough resources to buy any of the available Development Card
      Parameters:
      game - the game of type GameClient
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one card with a cost lower than player's resources, false otherwise

    • setCards

      private void setCards​(java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> developmentCards)
      This methods clear the dashboard and store the new cards, if a card is missing, its corresponding value will be set to null
      Parameters:
      developmentCards - new cards to store

    • getTopDevCard

      public DevelopmentCard getTopDevCard​(ColorDevCard color, Level level)
      Description copied from class: Dashboard
      Gets the development card (color,level) on the top of the stack.
      Specified by:
      getTopDevCard in class Dashboard
      Parameters:
      color - of type ColorDevCard: the color of the card wanted.
      level - of type Level: the level of the card wanted.
      Returns:
      null if stack is empty, otherwise return the card in the top position, the one you can buy
      See Also:
      Dashboard.getTopDevCard(ColorDevCard, Level)
